title: Li + H2O - net ionic equation for reaction

content.question: Which of the following is the balanced net-ionic equation for the reaction between Li(s) and water?

choices.label: 2 Li(s) + 2 H+(aq) + 2 OH−(aq) → 2 Li+(aq) + 2 OH−(aq) + H2(g)

skill.text: 5.E: Determine a balanced chemical equation for a given chemical phenomenon.
